channel.title: Morel on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Michigan morel festivals for 2009, and how to find morels
item.description: My search logs are starting to show hits for morel season, so it's time to put this year's post together.  The early reports from the morel progression sightings map show a few isolated dots in southern Michigan, as of April 22 2009, but typically May is morel month, when and where the May apples are in good form. Here's a list of some morel festivals in the state; if I have missed any, please let me know so that next year's list can be better.
